titleStmt.title: A compendious narration of the most examplar life of the right honourable and most virtuous Lady Mary, late Countess of Shrewsbury Faithfully collected out of the writings of a most learned and worthy person who attended her many years: by a gentleman, who by reason of his long acquaintance and much conversation with her can testifie the truth of all that is here related.
titleStmt.author: Gentleman.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Folger Shakespeare Library, Washington, D.C.
